name: Beginner's Trainer
description: As proof that you completed the Trainer Lord's exercises, you were gifted this.|This panel is very versatile, granting many useful parameters for anyone.
topFlavorText: Proof that you completed the transdimensional beginner's tutorial.

name: Enchanter's Guile
description: The first steps on the path to becoming a true War-Magi.|Max this panel to unlock \C[1]"Mages' Hands"\C[0].
topFlavorText: Enhances the bearer's ability to do magical things.

name: Mages' Hands
description: The next steps on the path to becoming a true War-Magi.|Max this panel to unlock \C[1]"Warlock's Rage"\C[0].
topFlavorText: Further enhances the bearer's ability to do magical things.

name: Warlock's Rage
description: More steps on the path to becoming a true War-Magi.
topFlavorText: Greatly enhances the bearer's ability to do magical things.

name: Sorcel Pledge
description: The halfway point on the path to becoming a true War-Magi.
topFlavorText: Significantly enhances the bearer's ability to do magical things.

name: Arcane Oath
description: The path moves ever-forward to becoming a true War-Magi.
topFlavorText: Tremendously enhances the bearer's ability to do magical things.

name: Fighter's Spirit
description: The first steps on the path to becoming a true War-Lord.|Max this panel to unlock \C[1]"Soldiers' Grit"\C[0].
topFlavorText: Improves the combat prowess and instincts of the bearer.

name: Soldiers' Grit
description: The next steps on the path to becoming a true War-Lord.|Max this panel to unlock \C[1]"Warrior's Edge"\C[0].
topFlavorText: Further improves the combat prowess and instincts of the bearer.

name: Warrior's Edge
description: More steps on the path to becoming a true War-Lord.
topFlavorText: Greatly improves the combat prowess and instincts of the bearer.

name: Berserker Pride
description: More steps on the path to becoming a true War-Lord.
topFlavorText: Significantly improves the combat prowess and instincts of the bearer.

name: Oath of Vengeance
description: The path marches ever-forward to becoming a true War-Lord.
topFlavorText: Tremendously improves the combat prowess and instincts of the bearer.

name: Ghosty Presence
description: Even the ever-iconic ghosty has things you can learn.|Just lean in and listen real good, they whisper dark things and touch your butt.
topFlavorText: Slaying Ghostys is required in this game. Good job.

name: Otherworldly Dark
description: Sometimes, the dead end up reaching back and touching you in ways you don't like-|Like murderously.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Death's Touch" when this panel is maxed.

name: Spooky Aura
description: The spooky is an ancient earthen spirit that was laid to rest centuries ago.|Here you are, disturbing its beauty rest like some kind of jackass- seriously, why?!
topFlavorText: When the going gets tough, the ghosty levels up to a spooky.

name: Erocian Strong Style
description: This long-forgotten slime really knew how to wrangle.|The Erocian Strong Style is a reckless style with a goal of maximizing enemy bone breakage.
topFlavorText: "Slimes just aren't as strong as they used to be." --Rupert

name: Goo Tango
description: A slime literally in a dark ass basin apparently had this panel.|This slime doesn't appear different than normal slimes, but Liquify sure does hurt.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Liquify" when this panel is maxed.

name: Mostly-Seeing Eyes
description: It was a stretch to call this a slime, but then you see its tentacles.|Known for gorging on bearcats during the winter, apparently.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Brainfog" when this panel is maxed.

name: Temporal Tactics
description: While some slimes just absorb your essence through material breakdown,|others are more inclined to melt your face off from another dimension.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Auto-Trudge" when this panel is maxed.

name: Redhot Blobbing
description: It is difficult to tell if this was an actual living entity, or just some blob of lava you hacked at for a while.|Either way, its explosions suck so chopping these up is encouraged.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill \Skill[423] when this panel is maxed.

name: Sting like a Bee
description: The lessons learned by all of the slain needlers in the land.|Slaying these pests not only make you feel better, but also help "the people".
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Lunge" when this panel is maxed.

name: Pressure Points
description: These appear to be just off-colored Needlers, but they are exponentially more vicious!|The speed of these things is insane, and now yours can be, too.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Venomous Burst" when this panel is maxed.

name: Tentacular Touch
description: Sometimes you just need to reach out and slap a lot of people at once.|Thanks to Rooting Tendrils, soon you can too!
topFlavorText: Whip it good.

name: Bloody Embrace
description: The poison of the bloodtrap is extremely dangerous.|Even a few drops can weaken the body enough to be devourable by the trap.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Sap" when this panel is maxed.

name: Bearfisting It
description: Why put a glove on it when you can just bearfist it instead?|Bearfisting is an ancient technique passed down from grizzly to grizzly.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Heavy Blow" when this panel is maxed.

name: Stone's Secret
description: The panel derived from centuries of breeding. Not selective or anything, just regular ol' breeding.|Probably started with a goal in mind, but ya know, bear urges happened.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Ferocious Swing" when this panel is maxed.

name: Orcan Obediance
description: These orcs were once quite menacing, but clearly your subduing put them into place.|If only you could make use of some of their skills...
topFlavorText: Learn \Skill[246] when this panel is maxed.

name: Orcan Stormcalling
description: Upper eschelons of orcs are oft heavily intuned with nature, allowing manipulation of the elements.|Thunder is deadly to manipulate, so why not learn it yourself?
topFlavorText: Learn \Skill[247] when this panel is maxed.

name: Impish Insight
description: The insight of the kappa is literally dripping with moisture.|Incase you're not sure what that means, neither am I.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Kappa Slap" when this panel is maxed.

name: River Runs Deep
description: In some regions, kappa have come together in a sort of community and begun showing more civilized behavior.|This particular kappa appears to communicate with some sort of higher deity... I wonder if we'll meet them later?
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Energy Beam" when this panel is maxed.

name: Kappan Dirty Tricks
description: Not all kappas are magical and worship their deities.|Some are guards for said shamans, and they really like playing dirty.
topFlavorText: When you're just a shark-man, you sometimes need a dirty trick or two to win.

name: Resourceful Ratactics
description: Rats manage to thrive in nearly all environments, including flooded rivers.|Channel your inner rat and get resourceful.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Tumble" when this panel is maxed.

name: Skies of the Cave
description: Bats are vicious and obnoxious creatures|They are renowned far and wide for slaying young would-be protagonists.
topFlavorText: You truly can never chop up enough bats. You're doing the cave a favor.

name: Soak 'n' Spray
description: Apparently, this planet has somehow managed to evolve water bats.|We aren't talking about bats that like water, we're talking bats MADE OF WATER.
topFlavorText: Bats that are made of water are just as stupid as those that aren't.

name: Crimson Gaze
description: An ever-iconic eyeball with wings. They can be found all across the universe for some reason.|This one however, appears to be wrapped in flames, which makes it rather annoying to get close to.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill \Skill[248] when this panel is maxed.

name: Flame's Caress
description: When the flames caress you, the power swells within.|It might be something else swelling, though.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Willow's Flame" when this panel is maxed.

name: Bullheaded
description: Being bullheaded isn't always a bad thing.|He grew to be big and strong from a little cow before you slayed him!
topFlavorText: Be strong and tenacious like the bull. Or pretend at least.

name: Ironfist of Iron
description: The terror of the megataurs are known far and wide.|Deleting them would save hundreds of lives per year.
topFlavorText: The one with the iron fist of iron will rule.

name: Pissed Off Sprout
description: The rage of a sprout (such as a Fungrowth) should never be underestimated.|Never forget.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Rage Growth" when this panel is maxed.

name: Flowing Fluids
description: May the fluids flow and... not ebb, that would be weird. Especially from a Jelli.|Don't do that.
topFlavorText: The jelly's luminance has been extinguished. ðŸ’”

name: Scorn of Fae
description: Fae's have always been the kings of being able to piss you off by throwing rocks at you.|But soon, you too will be able to piss people off by throwing rocks at them!
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Earth Crush" when this panel is maxed.

name: Thief's Code
description: The thief's code describes all sorts of various rules.|They are really more like guidelines, though.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Shockwave" when this panel is maxed.

name: Outlaw's Shortcuts
description: In the north eastern reaches of Erocia, disaster appears to have struck.|Bandits leveled up their game and transcended to outlaws, making your life that much harder.
topFlavorText: Even bandits need to step up their game from time to time.

name: Glutton's Dogma
description: The dogma of the Glutton is held above all else: "thou must satiate thine hunger".
topFlavorText: This panel radiates with a strange energy...

name: Burrow Burr
description: An ancient panel with a burr still in it.|Who knows what we'll be able to do with it.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Void Spiral" when this panel is maxed.

name: Living Volcano
description: While the burrowing worms are scary, worms that burrow through lava are even more frightening.|Their \Skill[425] is nothing to shake a stick at, so shove that stick down their throat and spare yourself the burns.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill \Skill[425] when this panel is maxed.

name: Boney Situation
description: The skeleton is an age-old RPG enemy- often frail and wimpy.|These skeletors live up to that expectation in spades.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Backstep" when this panel is maxed.

name: Spinal Control
description: When the opportunity to smash up skeletons comes about, one must accept.|Smashing up skeledoggos is no exception to this hardfast rule.
topFlavorText: The benefits of the dead should be weighed carefully.

name: Princely Flourish
description: Regally speaking, one should verily be theoretically flourishing preposterously nonstop.|IndubitiblyðŸ§.
topFlavorText: Be mindful of the poison, because poison fuckin' hurts and there are no antidotes.

name: Lamian Royalty
description: Regally speaking, one should verily be theoretically flourishing preposterously nonstop.|IndubitiblyðŸ§.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Energy Arrow" when this panel is maxed.

name: Dragonic Sacrifice
description: The dargins of Erocia can vary wildly in shape, size, color, and elemental affinity.|The Lesser Dargins are known for their petite stature, but they are still formidible.
topFlavorText: Learn the skill "Dargin Flames" when this panel is maxed.

name: Titan's Girth
description: Titans are a mighty race, surpassed only by folks who have guns, because guns obviously.|You really can just end a lot of life if you get good at shooting shit.
topFlavorText: A mighty foe drops a mighty panel.

name: Crabtastical Crunchiness
description: The crabs of Volcanis are no joke, what with them constantly trying to keep you rooted in-place.|It is unclear how they exist in such a hot area without just being cooked by the ambient temperature.
topFlavorText: Combo crabs are the worst- not even good enough for eating.
